definition: hemolysis (breakdown of red blood cells leading to anemia)
hemolytic disease of newborn (breakdown of red blood cells due to alloimmune reaction between mother and fetus)

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the infectivity of the Vibrio parahaernolyticus isolated from the brine.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究从海水中分离出的副溶血弧菌的致病性。

sentences.english: Babesiosis can cause hemolytic anemia in dogs.
sentences.chinese: 巴贝斯虫病能引起犬只的溶血性贫血。

sentences.english: Lysophospholipids were produced from soybean phospholipids by phospholipase A1 acid hydrolysis.
sentences.chinese: 采用磷脂酶A1催化酸解大豆磷脂获得溶血磷脂。

sentences.english: Lysophospholipids are often observed in plant lipid extracts .
sentences.chinese: 溶血磷脂在植物类脂提取物中常看到。

sentences.english: She was diagnosed with systemic lupus erythematosus complicated by hemolytic uremic syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 狼疮并发生溶血性尿毒症候群。

sentences.english: Sea water in products Vibrio parahaemolyticus detection rate for the highest 25%.
sentences.chinese: 在生海水产品中副溶血性弧菌检出率最高为25%。

sentences.english: Objective To survey the status of intestinal infections by V. parahaemolyticus in the local area.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解宿州地区副溶血性弧菌的肠道感染情况。

sentences.english: Vibrio parahaemolyticus is an important microorganism pathogen for food intoxication cases.
sentences.chinese: 副溶血性弧菌是食物中毒的重要病原菌。

sentences.english: It does not prevent infection by hemolytic streptococci.
sentences.chinese: 它并不能防止溶血性链球菌的感染。

sentences.english: Hemolysis experiment demonstrates the lipopeptides has hemolysis activity.
sentences.chinese: 溶血实验表明其具有溶血活性。

sentences.english: Hemolysis experiment demonstrates the lipopeptides has hemolysis activity.
sentences.chinese: 溶血实验表明其具有溶血活性。

sentences.english: This is probably the first reported hemolytic transfusion reaction.
sentences.chinese: 这可能是第一次报道溶血性输血反应。

sentences.english: The potentially fatal complication is called haemolytic uraemic syndrome (HUS).
sentences.chinese: 最严重的可能会引起溶血尿毒综合症。

sentences.english: Hemolytic icterus occurs in the neonate of the horse and swine.
sentences.chinese: 溶血性黄疸发生于马和猪的初生幼畜。

sentences.english: Hemolytic anemia, hemoglobinuria, jaundice & mucous membrane petechiation.
sentences.chinese: 溶血性贫血，血红蛋白尿，黄疸，粘膜有瘀点。

definition: hemolytic disease of newborn (breakdown of red blood cells due to alloimmune reaction between mother and fetus)
hematin (blood pigment)/heme/hemoglobin/also written 血紅蛋白|血红蛋白
